rooms.description: Contemporary living space with ample natural light, large windows facing east to catch the morning sunlight; wheelchair accessible flooring; Vastu compliant east-facing entrance.
Modern open kitchen integrated with the living area, featuring energy-efficient appliances and ample ventilation; designed for ease of movement for wheelchair users.
Open dining space adjoining the living area, designed to maximize airflow and natural lighting; accessible layout.
Compact yet functional servant's quarters with built-in storage, adequate ventilation and accessible bathroom facilities for ease of movement.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible entrance with low threshold, leading directly to the living room and kitchen.
Secondary exit providing ventilation and additional access for service staff.
Large east-facing window to harness natural light and maintain energy efficiency; Vastu compliant placement.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ample natural light from east-facing windows; includes built-in wardrobe and en-suite bathroom for accessibility.
Secondary bedroom designed for privacy, featuring large ventilation openings and natural lighting; wheelchair accessible layout.
Well-ventilated en-suite bathroom with barrier-free design, grab bars, and non-slip flooring.

openings.description: Sturdy staircase with handrails at both sides for safe, wheelchair-accessible mobility between floors; designed in compliance with local building codes.
East-facing window to enhance natural light and ensure proper ventilation in bedrooms.

rooms.description: Open studio space combining living, dining, and study areas; designed with large windows for natural light and ventilation; flexible layout adhering to Vastu principles.
Additional convertible space for storage or a guest room; easily accessible via open stairs and incorporates abundant natural light through skylights.

openings.description: South-facing window to enhance cross ventilation and natural illumination in the studio area.
Secondary staircase for direct access to the loft space; includes handrails ensuring safe mobility.
